verses.kjv: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:
verses.web: But say the things which fit sound doctrine,
verses.ct: As for you, teach what lines up with sound doctrine.

verses.kjv: That the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.
verses.web: that older men should be temperate, sensible, sober minded, sound in faith, in love, and in perseverance:
verses.ct: Older men should be clear-headed, dignified, and self-controlled — solid in faith, in love, and in patience.

verses.kjv: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;
verses.web: and that older women likewise be reverent in behavior, not slanderers nor enslaved to much wine, teachers of that which is good,
verses.ct: Older women, too, should live in a way that honors God. They shouldn't be gossips or heavy drinkers, but instead should teach what is good.

verses.kjv: That they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,
verses.web: that they may train the young wives to love their husbands, to love their children,
verses.ct: That way they can train the younger women to love their husbands and love their children,

verses.kjv: To be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.
verses.web: to be sober minded, chaste, workers at home, kind, being in subjection to their own husbands, that God’s word may not be blasphemed.
verses.ct: to be self-controlled, pure, devoted to their homes, kind, and respectful of their own husbands — so that no one has reason to speak against God's word.

verses.kjv: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.
verses.web: Likewise, exhort the younger men to be sober minded.
verses.ct: In the same way, encourage the younger men to be self-controlled.

verses.kjv: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,
verses.web: In all things be showing yourself an example of good works. In your teaching, be showing integrity, seriousness, incorruptibility,
verses.ct: In everything you do, be a living example of good works. When you teach, do it with integrity, seriousness, and sincerity.

verses.kjv: Sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.
verses.web: and soundness of speech that can’t be condemned, that he who opposes you may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say about us.
verses.ct: Let your words be sound and above criticism, so that anyone who opposes you will be put to shame, with nothing bad to say about us.

verses.kjv: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
verses.web: Exhort servants to be in subjection to their own masters and to be well-pleasing in all things, not contradicting,
verses.ct: Tell servants to submit to their own masters and to do their best to please them in everything, without talking back.

verses.kjv: Not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.
verses.web: not stealing, but showing all good fidelity, that they may adorn the doctrine of God, our Savior, in all things.
verses.ct: They shouldn't steal but should prove themselves completely trustworthy — so that in every way they make the teaching about God our Savior attractive.

verses.kjv: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,
verses.web: For the grace of God has appeared, bringing salvation to all men,
verses.ct: For the grace of God has broken through, bringing salvation to all people.

verses.kjv: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;
verses.web: instructing us to the intent that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we would live soberly, righteously, and godly in this present age;
verses.ct: It teaches us to turn away from ungodliness and worldly desires and to live with self-control, integrity, and devotion to God in this present age,

verses.kjv: Looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;
verses.web: looking for the blessed hope and appearing of the glory of our great God and Savior, Jesus Christ,
verses.ct: while we wait for that blessed hope — the glorious appearing of our great God and Savior, Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
verses.web: who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify for himself a people for his own possession, zealous for good works.
verses.ct: He gave himself for us to rescue us from every kind of sin and to make us his own people, purified and passionate about doing good.

verses.kjv: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
verses.web: Say these things and exhort and reprove with all authority. Let no one despise you.
verses.ct: Teach these things. Encourage and correct people with full authority. Don't let anyone look down on you.
